DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of bimatoprost solution compared with vehicle in the treatment of eyebrow hypotrichosis (inadequate eyebrows).
DOC.brief_title: Bimatoprost for the Treatment of Eyebrow Hypotrichosis
DOC.criteria: Adult participants with eyebrow hypotrichosis (inadequate eyebrow growth). Patients with disease, infection, or abnormality of the eyebrow area Patients with permanent eyebrow loss due to overgrooming
